channel.title: chromebook on Jason Scheirer
channel.description: Recent content in chromebook on Jason Scheirer

item.title: My Dingus Chromebook still works
item.description: So I bought that dang Chromebook over three years ago at this point and it keeps chugging on. Google has continued to ship OS updates (which I only notice as weird, arbitrary UI changes) and I can still use it to code but its main purpose now is its new life: ChromeOS runs Android apps pretty well, so I put an SD card full of movies on it and play them via VLC for my kid.

item.title: Turn a Chromebook into the ULTIMATE GOLANG/PYTHON DEVELOPER MACHINE
item.description: This is a recycled post from my tumblr weblog Ha ha ha just lying the real title should be Turning a Piece of Shit Chromebook into a Good Enough Development Machine Because You’re Unemployed and Feel Like An Ass Trying to Justify Spending $2000 on a God Damned Macbook so You Wound Up Buying a Chromebook Instead Anyway, I’m unemployed because of reasons and figured there were better things to do with the credit limit on my credit card than spend $2000 on a Macbook, so I bought one of the highest rated Chromebooks at my “willing to pay this much” price point: the Chromebook C100P.
